text: Wênio Moraes Pio (born 9 September 1979), known simply as Wênio, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Mineiros Esporte Clube as a defensive midfielder. He usually sported a distinctive peroxide blonde hair,Wênio: «Como não jogava...» (Wênio: «Since i didn't play...»); Record, 11 July 2009 (in Portuguese) and spent most of his professional career in Portugal, amassing Primeira Liga totals of 170 games and three goals over the course of eight seasons, mainly in representation of Marítimo. ==Football career== Born in Mineiros, Goiás, Wênio was relatively unknown when he signed for C.S. Marítimo from Sport Club Corinthians Alagoano in 2002. However, he went on to become an essential midfield element for the Madeira club, appearing in 30 Primeira Liga games in the 2003–04 campaign as it achieved a final UEFA Cup spot. On 12 November 2007 he scored a rare goal, in a 2–0 derby away win against C.D. Nacional.Nacional-Marítimo, 0–2 (destaques) (Nacional-Marítimo, 0–2 (highlights)); Mais Futebol, 12 November 2007 (in Portuguese) In June 2008, Wênio signed a three-year contract with Vitória S.C. in Guimarães.Wênio é reforço para o meio-campo (Wênio is a midfield addition); Record, 10 June 2008 (in Portuguese) After one season – and 16 top division matches – he was released,Wénio e Cícero rescindiram (Wênio and Cícero cut ties); Vitória SC, 31 August 2009 (in Portuguese) joining fellow league side Leixões S.C. shortly after.Wênio no Leixões (Wênio at Leixões); Leixões SC, 1 September 2009 (in Portuguese) After a brieft stint in Azerbaijan with FC Baku,Lupa na Europa – Ep. 2 (Europe magnifying glass – Ep. 2); Europa Football, 9 November 2010 (in Portuguese) Wênio returned to his country and region and signed with amateurs Morrinhos Futebol Clube. He continued to play in Brazil's lower leagues in the following years.Volante Wênio se apresenta ao Tourão (Defensive midfielder Wênio presents himself at Tourão); Araguaína FR, 17 February 2011 (in Portuguese)CRB continua contratando e anuncia volante experiente para 2012 (CRB keep signing and announce experienced defensive midfielder for 2012); Cada Minuto, 16 December 2011 (in Portuguese) ==References== ==External links== * * *Futebol de Goyaz profile * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Sport Club Corinthians Alagoano players Category:Araguaína Futebol e Regatas players Category:Clube de Regatas Brasil players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:C.S. title: Wênio
